name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF TRAFFIC SAFETY, Appellee, v. John KOBALY, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF TRAFFIC SAFETY, Appellee, v. John KOBALY, Appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
384 A.2d 1208
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF TRAFFIC SAFETY, Appellee, v. John KOBALY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 6, 1978.
Decided April 7, 1978.
Reargument Denied May 8, 1978.
Vincent J. Morocco, Redlich, Cassol, Redlich & Morocco, Greensburg, Anthony V. DeCello, DeCello, Bua & Manifesto, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
John L. Heaton, Asst. Atty. Gen., Robert W. Cunliffe, Deputy Atty. Gen., Robert P. Kane, Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
